BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Prelude.RAM.asyncRam#
BlackBox.type:
asyncRam# :: SClock wclk       -- ^ wclk, ARG[0]
           -> SClock rclk       -- ^ rclk, ARG[1]
           -> SNat n            -- ^ sz,   ARG[2]
           -> Signal' wclk Int  -- ^ wr,   ARG[3]
           -> Signal' rclk Int  -- ^ rd,   ARG[4]
           -> Signal' wclk Bool -- ^ en,   ARG[5]
           -> Signal' wclk a    -- ^ din,  ARG[6]
           -> Signal' rclk a
